column3: Traffic;Construction on the planned------ Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville express highway ------is set to commence on March 22.------Machines and equipment are all in place to begin work on the 190 km long road. The project is expected to take 4 years and cost around $2 billion.------Landowners
column4: whose property sits in the way of the route have been promised generous compensation packages.------Around $100 million has already been invested in the construction equipment.
